roleset.name: give, associate with again

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Fluor Daniel already has reassigned most of its work crew, the sources said.

example.name: all args
example.text: In a move to prevent any dislocation in the financial markets from the California earthquake , the Securities and Exchange Commission said it temporarily reassigned options listed on the Pacific Stock Exchange to the American , New York and Philadelphia stock exchanges and to the Chicago Board Options Exchange .
example.arg: options listed on the Pacific Stock Exchange
to the American , New York and Philadelphia stock exchanges and to the Chicago Board Options Exchange
